title: Q-SYS Core Configuration
description: Configuration file for connecting to your Q-SYS Core

qsysCore._comment: Replace these values with your actual Q-SYS Core details

instructions.step1: Update the 'qsysCore' section with your actual Core details
instructions.step2: Ensure your Q-SYS Core has QRWC (Remote Control) enabled
instructions.step3: Check that the Core is reachable on your network
instructions.step4: Run 'npm run dev' to test the connection

troubleshooting.portBlocked: Ensure firewall allows access to the specified port
